messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Goldfish <<< Seeking revenge?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Actually, Barb and I think this might be some sort of evil Ishin conspiracy. Did you notice in the OVA the scene where Katsura is feeding his fish? We
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/22/2004 3:12:53 PM Eastern Daylight Time, secretarytocapt3@... writes:

> I noticed you were able to appease the carp. I've never had any
> problems with logging in on ezboard.
>
> On a side note...I think I know it's source of hatred for some of us.
> The historical Serizawa Kamo (not our beloved resident scholar) ate a
> temple carp right? In Buddhist (goes with Shinto shrines too) culture
> any animals living on temple grounds should not be killed.
> It's
> baaaaack....


Actually, Barb and I think this might be some sort of evil Ishin conspiracy. Did you notice in the OVA the scene where Katsura is feeding his fish? We think the Evil Goldfish sprang from his pond and is now after those of us who worship the memory of the Shinsengumi.

-MissBehavin (Hijikata's Chamber Maid)
Official Member of the I Hate Babelfish Club
"It takes little to amuse me and even less to confuse me."

messages.subject: Goldfish <<< Seeking revenge?
messages.msgSnippet: I noticed you were able to appease the carp.  I ve never had any problems with logging in on ezboard. On a side note...I think I know it s source of hatred for
messages.messageBody:
I noticed you were able to appease the carp. I've never had any
problems with logging in on ezboard.

On a side note...I think I know it's source of hatred for some of us.
The historical Serizawa Kamo (not our beloved resident scholar) ate a
temple carp right? In Buddhist (goes with Shinto shrines too) culture
any animals living on temple grounds should not be killed. It's
baaaaack....

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Sort of OT: More Goldfish Conspiracy Theories
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/22/2004 10:48:08 AM Eastern Standard Time, Warg3791@**** writes: Ok, I m now convinced the Goldfish is out to get some of us. First
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/22/2004 10:48:08 AM Eastern Standard Time,
Warg3791@... writes:
Ok, I'm now convinced the Goldfish is out to get some of us. First
Phil's mysterious message problem has taken her out of the loop
temporarily. Now I can't log on with ezboard!!! It's the fish I tell
you!!! THAT EVIL GOLDFISH IS OUT TO GET US!!! It's joined forces with
ezboard so Barb and I can't spread the word about it's plans to
spread confusion across the face of the globe!!!

On a sidenote, I think it's also taken over ff.net. That's why
they're slowly becoming PITAs...

(On a serious note, does anyone know what exactly is going on with
the message board? Or am I the only one having trouble?)

-MissBehavin (Hijikata's Chamber Maid)
Official Member of the I Hate Babelfish Club
"It takes little to amuse me and even less to confuse me."
Yes, I'm aware I'm replying to my own post. That's because the danged thing
went out TWICE when I know for certain I only posted it ONCE!!! NOW TELL ME
THE GOLDFISH ISN'T EVIL!!!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
